Title: addQuarters
Description: Adds a specified number of quarters to a date, a date with time or a string-encoded date / date with time.
date: Date / date with time to add specified number of quarters to. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64, String.num: Number of quarters to add. (U)Int*, Float*.
Returns date plus num quarters. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-01-01') AS date,    toDateTime('2024-01-01 00:00:00') AS date_time,    '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AS date_time_stringSELECT    addQuarters(date, 1) AS add_quarters_with_date,    addQuarters(date_time, 1) AS add_quarters_with_date_time,    addQuarters(date_time_string, 1) AS add_quarters_with_date_time_string
